full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 62 of 261 1202
LC6VMAX2 Kate - direct
1 Q. Who was he with?
2 A. He was with -- there was some kind of trainer with him.
3 Q. Did the trainer stay with him?
4 A. No.
5 Q. After the trainer left, without getting into the details,
did Epstein initiate sexual contact with you?
6
7 A. Yes.
8 Q. Did Epstein engage in a sex act with you?
9 A. Yes.
10 Q. What if later --
11 MS. POMERANTZ: Withdrawn, your Honor.
12 Q. What, if anything, did Maxwell say to you later that day?
13 A. She asked me if I had fun, and told me that I was such a
14 good girl, and that I was one of his favorites. And that's it.
15 Q. Did Epstein engage in sexual activity with you again during
that trip?
16
17 A. Yes.
18 Q. One time or multiple times?
19 A. Multiple times.
20 Q. You testified earlier that you went to the island. What is
the island?
21
22 A. The island was an island that Jeffrey owned.
23 Q. What was the name of the island?
24 A. Well, he called it Little St. Jeff.
25 Q. When you went to the island, who invited you there?
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018399

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. The content is a Q&A session between a lawyer and a witness, discussing events related to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. There are no visible redactions or damage to the document.
